title: 'Silent-type' cells play greater role in brain behavior than previously thought

title_detail.value: 'Silent-type' cells play greater role in brain behavior than previously thought

summary: Brain cells recorded as among the least electrically active during a specific task may be the most important to doing it right.

summary_detail.value: Brain cells recorded as among the least electrically active during a specific task may be the most important to doing it right.
